title: Los inscripciones para recordatorios de la corte del condado de Bumcombe
description: Un proyecto de Code For Asheville

description.paragraph1: [NEED SPANISH TRANSLATION] This site lets you sign up for text message reminders about upcoming criminal court dates in Buncombe County. It is free for use by anyone. Simply search for a name, select one of the resulting defendants, and provide a phone number that can receive text messages.
description.paragraph2: The site is maintained by volunteers for the benefit of the community. It is intended to help people show up for court in Buncombe County, but no guarantee is made. Showing up for court remains your responsibility.

search.title: Busque para los casos judiciales
search.description: Ingresa su nombre, segundo y apellido para buscar los casos judiciales suyos. Aparecerán en la siguiente tabla.

inputfields.middleName: El segundo nombre o la inicial (opcional)

select.title: Seleccione un acusado y regístrerse
select.description: Los acusados que coinciden con su búsqueda se enumeran a continuación. Seleccione uno para registrarse.

casesTable.help: Puede ver detalles sobre los cargos en el sitio web del NC Judicial Branch

signup.title: [SP] Sign Up for Case Notifications for
signup.description: [SP] Enter your cell phone to subscribe to text message reminders of any Buncombe County court dates for this defendant. You will receive two reminders, one a week  in advance and one a couple days before the court date.
